entities.name: vol
entities.description: Vol is mentioned as part of a question, indicating that someone named Vol is being referred to. ("what's Vol — ?")

entities.name: dedalus diggle
entities.description: Dedalus Diggle dropped his hat again, indicating that he is present in the scene and has a physical presence.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody growled and spoke to Harry, indicating that he is present in the scene and interacting with others.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry was spoken to by Moody and responded to him, indicating that he is present in the scene and interacting with others.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks spoke conversationally to Moody, indicating that she is present in the scene and interacting with others.

relationships.description:
Moody spoke to Harry, as indicated by their conversation. ("What?” said Harry.
“We’re not discussing anything he re, it’s too risky,” said Moody, turning his normal eye on Harry; his  magical eye remained pointing up at the ceiling.)
Moody was spoken to by Tonks, as indicated by her conversation. ("Mad-Eye, you do know that’s disgusting, don’t you?” said Tonks conversationally.)
Moody mentioned Vol in a question, indicating that he is aware of or has knowledge about someone named Vol. ("what’s Vol — ?")
